aka: Escorreguei, caí e bati com a cara na pista de dança
this_title: Slipped, Fell and Smacked My Face Off the Dance Floor
trans_title: Escorreguei, caí e bati com a cara na pista de dança
introduction: This film touches on ideas of therapeutic infrastructures, tourism and the body as an archive. Performers intimate moments of dialogue in this public space.源自：https://festivalecra.com/slipped-fell-and-smacked-my-face-off-the-dance-floor/?lang=en
chinese_title: Slipped, Fell and Smacked My Face Off the Dance Floor
